text: Her Summer Hero is a lostThe Library of Congress/FIAF American Silent Feature Film Survival Catalog:Her Summer Hero 1928 silent film comedy-drama directed by James Dugan and starring Sally Blane, Hugh Trevor and Harold Goodwin.Pictorial History of the Silent Screen p.315 c.1953 by Daniel BlumThe AFI Catalog of Feature Films 1893-1993:Her Summer Hero ==Cast== *Hugh Trevor - Kenneth Holmes *Harold Goodwin - Herb Darrow *Duane Thompson - Joan Stanton *James Pierce - Chris *Cleve Moore - Al Stanton *Sally Blane - Grave ==References== ==External links== * * Category:1928 films Category:Lost American films Category:American films Category:American black-and-white films Category:Film Booking Offices of America films Category:American silent feature films Category:1928 comedy-drama films Category:American comedy-drama films Category:1928 lost films Category:Lost comedy-drama films Category:1928 comedy films Category:1928 drama films
title: Her Summer Hero
